title: Plan Campaign Media Flighting
description: A media planner needs to create a flighting schedule for a campaign, concentrating ad spend during peak seasonal periods.

tasks.description: Analyze historical sales data to identify seasonal peaks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that sales peak in June-July and November.

tasks.description: Create a flighting calendar that allocates a higher percentage of the media budget to the identified peak months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a calendar with increased spend during the peak seasons and lower spend during off-seasons.

tasks.description: Share the flighting plan with the campaign management team for implementation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the plan to the execution team.
